name: Monkey Magic
overview: Monkey's journey begins in the sacred peach garden, he must embark on a dangerous quest up the trees to collect the magic fruits, however the fruits are guarded be demons and other strange creatures who have inhabited the trees. All the peaches MUST be collected before Monkey receives his Magic Cloud. When Monkey recieves his Magic Cloud, he has to battle with the evil creatures of the universe. GOOD LUCK!
